g.text: are obtained with an energy convergence of less than 10
eV and that the Hellman-Feynman forces acting on
each atom be below 0.01 eV/Å. The calculated optimized bulk lattice parameters for Cu
Cu(410), we used a periodic slab 24 Cu atomic layers thick ((1
1) surface unit cell, with one Cu atom per layer,
topmost 16 layers allowed to relax and the last 8 layers held at their bulk-truncated positions), separated by 15 Å
